replies.body: With so many different things going screwy in your client, it seems like it might be more related to damaged game files rather than anything to do with your actual connection. Let's run a quick repair through the client options and test it in a practice match. Also let's cover the rest of our bases by double checking your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for anything that might have been reset there.
